---
title: "Florida"
author: "Simon Jackman and Jeffrey Arnold"
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

learning about an unknown proportion from survey data; using survey data to update beliefs about support for Bush in Florida in the 2000 presidential election campaign; see Jackman's *Annual Review of Political Science* article.

```{r}
florida_mod <- stan_model("stan/florida.stan")
```

```{r}
florida_data <- list(
  mu_mean = 49.1,
  mu_sd = 2.2,
  y_sd = 2.2,
  y = 55  
)
```
```{r}
florida_fit <- sampling(florida_mod, data = florida_data)
```
